name: Puppets Runner
description:
Puppet runner mechanics is using one of the core mechanic of Geometry Dash. It was created for the Dev United #2 - Core Mechanic Jam.

Disclaimer : We are still using a prototyping asset for the player as we didn't had the time to finish. But it should soon be replaced with the little red riding hood and the wolf chasing it.

You have to choose wich correct block that match the actions should be placed to keep the puppet running.

Next action that will be played:

[1]    

[2]   

[3]   

The correct bloc to choose is the 3.


 

  

         RUN                         JUMP                   JUMP OVER

  • Player sprite by Kenney
  • Background / Tiles
  • Jump Sound by SnottyBoy
  • Fighting With Flowers by Eric Taylor
